languages.text: "Я знала, что вы сумеете оценить по достоинству работу мастеров {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}!" {n}Джай расцветает и неторопливо накручивает черную прядь волос на {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментированный{/g} палец.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я знала, что вы сумеете оценить по достоинству работу мастеров {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}!" {n}Джай расцветает и неторопливо накручивает черную прядь волос на {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментированный{/g} палец.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "I knew you would appreciate the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}' mastery of their craft!" {n}Jae beams at you, curling a lock of black hair around an {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} finger.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я знала, что вы сумеете оценить по достоинству работу мастеров {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}!" {n}Джай расцветает и неторопливо накручивает черную прядь волос на {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментированный{/g} палец.{/n}

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I knew you would appreciate the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}' mastery of their craft!" {n}Jae beams at you, curling a lock of black hair around an {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} finger.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我就知道你会欣赏{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}精湛的技艺！”{n}婕伊对你露出了笑容，将一缕黑发卷在带有{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}的手指上。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew you would appreciate the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}' mastery of their craft!" {n}Jae beams at you, curling a lock of black hair around an {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} finger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我就知道你会欣赏{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}精湛的技艺！”{n}婕伊对你露出了笑容，将一缕黑发卷在带有{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}的手指上。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Sabía que apreciaría la maestría de los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}!». {n}Jae te muestra una sonrisa radiante mientras enreda un mechón de pelo negro en torno a su dedo {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentado{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew you would appreciate the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}' mastery of their craft!" {n}Jae beams at you, curling a lock of black hair around an {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} finger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Sabía que apreciaría la maestría de los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}!». {n}Jae te muestra una sonrisa radiante mientras enreda un mechón de pelo negro en torno a su dedo {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentado{/g}.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたなら{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の工芸技術を高く評価してくれるって思っていたのよ！」{n}ジェイは自分の黒髪を一房、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}機械化手術{/g}済みの指に巻き付けながらニッコリと笑う。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew you would appreciate the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}' mastery of their craft!" {n}Jae beams at you, curling a lock of black hair around an {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} finger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あんたなら{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の工芸技術を高く評価してくれるって思っていたのよ！」{n}ジェイは自分の黒髪を一房、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}機械化手術{/g}済みの指に巻き付けながらニッコリと笑う。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je savais bien que vous apprécieriez à sa juste valeur le savoir-faire des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} ! » {n}Jae vous adresse un sourire radieux tout en entortillant une mèche de cheveux noirs autour de son doigt {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmenté{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew you would appreciate the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}' mastery of their craft!" {n}Jae beams at you, curling a lock of black hair around an {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} finger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je savais bien que vous apprécieriez à sa juste valeur le savoir-faire des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} ! » {n}Jae vous adresse un sourire radieux tout en entortillant une mèche de cheveux noirs autour de son doigt {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmenté{/g}.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich wusste, Ihr wisst die Meisterschaft der {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} bei ihrer Kunst zu schätzen!" {n}Jae strahlt dich an und wickelt eine schwarze Haarlocke um einen {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentierten{/g} Finger.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew you would appreciate the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}' mastery of their craft!" {n}Jae beams at you, curling a lock of black hair around an {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} finger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich wusste, Ihr wisst die Meisterschaft der {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} bei ihrer Kunst zu schätzen!" {n}Jae strahlt dich an und wickelt eine schwarze Haarlocke um einen {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentierten{/g} Finger.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zenoların{/g} bu zanaattaki maharetlerini takdir edeceğini biliyordum!" {n}Jae, siyah saçının bir buklesini {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmentli{/g} bir parmağına dolayarak sana tebessüm ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew you would appreciate the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}' mastery of their craft!" {n}Jae beams at you, curling a lock of black hair around an {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} finger.{/n}
